hero.subtitle_part1: AI-Powered Collectible Souvenir Cards: Transform Static Content into Living Stories,
hero.subtitle_part2: — the Future-Proof Upgrade to Static Displays, Leaflets, and Booklets. Perfect for Museums, Trade Shows, Conferences, and More.

about.title: Discover
about.intro: CardStudio fuses physical collectible souvenir cards with AI for interactive experiences. Through QR codes to access tailored digital content and unlock AI voice conversations on mobile devices—simple and app-free.
about.description1: Designed for museums, exhibitions, conferences, landmarks, attractions, hotels, etc. worldwide, CardStudio card replaces static displays, printed brochures, and static audio guides with a single premium keepsake. It boosts engagement with fun and educational interactions, leading to stronger connections with audiences.
about.description2: CardStudio cards also reduces printed material waste for your organization, delivering sustainable impact.
about.description3: Try CardStudio and see the difference. Launch easily with our one-stop service.

demo.title: See CardStudio
demo.subtitle: Watch how CardStudio turns visits into personalized digital adventures. Premium cards unlock AI storytelling—seamless, engaging, and unforgettable.

features.qr_access_desc: Scan and access digital content immediately—no app downloads required.
features.ai_voice_desc: Real-time, natural AI voice interactions adapted to interests and knowledge.
features.multilingual_desc: Natural conversations in 10+ languages for inclusive global engagement.
features.keepsakes_desc: Beautiful collectible cards that become treasured digital souvenirs.

how_it_works.title: How CardStudio
how_it_works.subtitle: Simple, seamless, and engaging—follow the visitor journey in just 4 steps.

steps.purchase_desc: Visitors buy premium CardStudio cards as both souvenirs and interactive guides.
steps.scan_desc: Scan the QR code to instantly access the digital contents and AI guide—no app downloads required.
steps.explore_desc: Engage through AI voice conversation and personalized storytelling for a guided adventure.
steps.collect_desc: Cards become treasured keepsakes, promoting repeat visits and lasting memories.

features.collectible_desc: QR-enabled designs that link to tailored digital contents and AI guides—creating digital keepsakes that boost revenue and repeat visits.
features.ai_guide_desc: Real-time, AI voice conversation—natural, low-latency chats adapted to interests, age, and knowledge. Dynamic interactions that understand context and answer follow-up questions.
features.no_app_desc: Scan QR on any smartphone—no downloads, no hassle for maximum adoption.
features.multilingual_desc: Natural conversations in multi languages: English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Arabiya, Spanish, French, Russian, etc — for inclusive engagement. One content upload, serves global audiences.
features.no_hardware_desc: Leverages visitors' devices—no venue setup or costly infrastructure required.
features.dashboard_desc: Self-service platform for content management, real-time data, card issuance, printing, and optimization.

applications.title: Where CardStudio
applications.subtitle: CardStudio transforms venues into interactive destinations—driving engagement and connections. Swipe to explore:

museums.role: Your personalized multi-language AI museum docent
museums.alternatives: Real person docents, audio guides, printed gallery guides, wall text translations

museums.benefit2: Experience multilingual tours and accessibility features

tourist.alternatives: Printed brochures and static displays of landmark history

zoos.benefit1: Engage with species information and conservation stories

conferences.alternatives: Printed conference handouts and paper booklets

training.benefit2: Explore networking opportunities and key takeaways

hotels.role: Your personal AI concierge in your language
hotels.alternatives: Welcome cards for guests, tour recommendation leaflets, in-room directories, service catalogs, restaurant menus

hotels.benefit2: Get dining suggestions and tailored guest services

restaurants.alternatives: Printed menus, multilingual menu cards, server explanations, dish description cards

restaurants.benefit3: Get dietary accommodations through natural conversations—elevating the dining experience for international guests

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.a1: CardStudio is an AI-powered platform that combines premium collectible cards with interactive voice guides, transforming visits into personalized digital adventures—no apps or hardware required.
faq.q2: How does it work for visitors?
faq.a2: Visitors buy or receive a QR-enabled card, scan it with their smartphone, and instantly access digital contents with AI-driven storytelling and conversations in their language. It's seamless and app-free.
faq.q3: How do venues get started with CardStudio?
faq.a3:
Launch in minutes—from idea to live experience in 3 simple steps:

Step 0: Register for CardStudio account.
Step 1: Design & Configure—Use intuitive tools to create cards. Upload your card design and digital contents to your CardStudio account and easy setup.
Step 2: Submit Your Card Order—Online submit the physical cards orders. Each card come with a different QR code to access the AI powered digital contents. We will handle the printing and shipping to your door.
Step 3: Analyze & Optimize—Track engagement with real-time analytics, refine content, and scale effortlessly.
faq.a4: Transparent pay-per-card pricing: $2.00 per card. Suggested retail: $3-7 USD (your profit: $1-5 per card). Alternative: Complimentary model (free to visitors, $2 cost to you). No monthly subscriptions, setup fees, or hidden costs—everything included (AI chats, multilingual support, dashboard, analytics, QR generation, print management, hosting, and 24/7 support).
faq.q5: Can we customize the cards and content?
faq.a5: Absolutely. Use our self-service tools for designs, manage digital contents, and AI interactions customization to match your venue need.
faq.a6: Minutes—cloud-based with no technical setup or IT integration. Launch instantly.
faq.q7: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.a7: 24/7 access to our expert team, plus an intuitive dashboard for analytics and updates.
faq.q8: How many days it takes for card printing and delivery?
faq.a8: Once you ordered CardStudio cards, we will get your card print within 4 working days. The shipping time depends from shipping address worldwide. Please expect around 5 – 10 days from the date of your card order to the date you receive the card.
faq.q9: What is the minimum order quantity?
faq.a9: The minimum order is {min} cards per order. This ensures cost-effective production. Each card comes with a unique QR code to access the digital contents and AI features.
faq.still_have_questions: Still have questions? Reach out via our Contact form.
